deposit(uint256).details: Update pendingFee before deposit. Anyone can call it except when paused.

params._amount: Amount of collateral token to deposit

interestEarned().details: Make sure to return value in collateral token and in order to do that we are using Uniswap to get collateral amount for earned DAI.

isUpgradable().details: If there are no cTokens in strategy then it is upgradable

migrateIn().details: Any working Compound strategy has cTokens in strategy contract.There can be scenarios when pool already has cTokens and new strategy will have to move those tokens from pool to self address.Only valid pool strategy is allowed to move tokens from pool.

migrateOut().details: There can be scenarios when we want to use new strategy without calling withdrawAll(). We can achieve this by moving tokens in pool and new strategy will take care from there.Pause this strategy, set pendingFee to zero and move tokens out.

rebalance().details: Calculate interest fee on earning from Compound and transfer fee to fee collector. Deposit available collateral from pool into Compound. Anyone can call it except when paused.

sweepErc20(address).details: Reserved tokens are not allowed to sweep.

token().details: Returns address of Compound token correspond to collateral token

totalLocked().details: This value will be used in pool share calculation, so true totalLocked will be balance in Compound minus any pending fee to collect.

returns._0: Return value will be in collateralToken defined decimal.

withdrawAll().details: Withdraw all collateral from Compound and deposit into pool. Controller only function, called when migrating strategy.

beforeWithdraw().notice: Vesper pools are using this function so it should exist in all strategies.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit collateral token from pool into Compound.

depositAll().notice: Deposit all collateral token from pool into Compound. Anyone can call it except when paused.

interestEarned().notice: Returns interest earned in COMP since last rebalance.

isReservedToken(address).notice: This method is deprecated and will be removed from Strategies in next release

isUpgradable().notice: Returns true if strategy can be upgraded.

migrateIn().notice: Migrate tokens from pool to this address

sweepErc20(address).notice: Sweep given token to vesper pool
